## Item Control (Classic/GCN Only)

This code allows you to freeze items and select an item to control (move it horizontally and vertically) across the track. This code is designed to only work with Classic Controller and GCN controller.

Suppose you're in a race that has 6 items on the track: 3 Red Shells, 2 FIBs and 1 Bob-omb.

You want to freeze the items and control them, so, you press Y, items are now frozen and the timer's milliseconds now display the item obj ID of the item type you're controlling, which in this case, is the Red Shell since it's the lowest ID (1) of the item obj ID list.

You are now controlling one of the three Red Shells on the track. The selected shell will display the team item light (The outline thingy around your team's item in Team VS/Battle Mode), that way you know what item you're controlling. Push Left Stick Up/Down to move the item vertically, push the Right Stick Up/Down/Left/Right to move the item horizontally. Note that the movement is based on the course's axis, not item direction, so it may be confusing at times.

Press D-Pad Left/Right to decrease/increase what item of that type to control, for example, pressing D-Pad Right will now control the second Red Shell, press again, third one, press D-Pad Left, second one.

Press D-Pad Down/Up to decrease/increase what item type to control, for example, pressing D-Pad Up will now control one of the two FIBs, and the timer millisecond will now display 007, which is the FIB's item obj ID. Press it again, you're now controlling the Bob-omb, press it one more time, you're back to the Red Shells, press D-Pad Down, you're back to the FIBs.

Press Y again, items are now unfrozen and will behave as normal. Timer millisecond is now working as intended as well.

You can also throw items while items are frozen, and they'll be frozen too and can be controlled.

Other important notes:
* I was able to make the team item light appear on Bob-ombs and Blue Shells but trying it on other items would cause in a crash and I couldn't figure it out, so you don't have a visual representation of what item you're moving
* Normally in the game, when items land, their physics are disabled, so if they are moved to the air, they stay frozen. Fortunately, I was able to find a solution to this and they now fall again.
* Items like Bananas are solid to players when controlled before they land, but if they ever, they will only be solid to players that were close to it when they were frozen. So, they are unsolid while being controlled but solid again when unfrozen. However, I did notice that other items like Mushrooms lose their collision forever, I am unsure why, it isn't status flags, it doesn't seem to be coordinates or behavior, so be aware. It's weird though, if there is someone close to it when it's frozen, they can be hit, but they can't hit players that are far.

This code is configurable, you can configure it to only freeze and control items thrown by you or freeze and control items thrown by anyone.

This code is designed for offline play but it can be used online. If used online, others will not see the existing items being moved, however, you can throw frozen items, move them and once unfrozen, other players will see all the items spawn on the location they were moved to.

This code is Vega's request (https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=2610)
